SELECT V.VHC_NO , V.VHC_KIND , V.VHC_TYPE , DL0.DL_CD_NM AS MAKER , DL1.DL_CD_NM AS DVC_KIND , DL2.DL_CD_NM AS DVC_TYPE , DL3.DL_CD_NM AS INST_LOC , D.DVC_ID , DH.MODEL_NM , DP.RSV_DATE FROM BM_VHC_INFO V LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_DVC_INFO D ON V.VHC_ID = D.VHC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_DVC_HIST DH ON D.DVC_ID = DH.DVC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_UPD_RSV DP ON D.DVC_ID = DP.DVC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL0 ON D.MAKER = DL0.DL_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL1 ON D.DVC_KIND = DL1.DL_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL2 ON D.DVC_TYPE = DL2.DL_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL3 ON D.INST_LOC = DL3.DL_CD
DH.MODEL_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%') OR V.VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%')
GROUP BY DVC_ID ORDER BY VHC_NO
